text: Capri-Sun is a brand of juice drink. It is based in Germany and Switzerland. It was invented by Rudolf Wild. It was introduced in West Germany in 1969 by his company as Capri-Sonne. It is now sold in over 100 countries, with licensees including Kraft Foods in the United States and Coca-Cola Europacific Partners in parts of Europe. Category:Soft drinks
title: Capri-Sun
